personal.name: Aditya Sinha
personal.title: Full Stack and Cloud Developer
personal.description: Skilled in building scalable applications, managing cloud infrastructure, and ensuring system reliability.

bio: I'm a software engineer and designer with a passion for creating elegant, efficient, and user-centered digital experiences. With expertise spanning front-end and back-end development, I combine technical knowledge with creative problem-solving to build applications that are both beautiful and functional.

Throughout my career, I've worked with a diverse range of technologies and frameworks, always focusing on writing clean, maintainable code that solves real-world problems. I believe in continuous learning and staying at the forefront of technological advancements.

journey.title: My Journey
